p: Furthermore, we extracted the total RNA of these infected cells and detected the transcription of dsRNA through reverse transcription PCR (RT-PCR). A 419-bp band of dsJHAMT-specific product was detectable in cells infected with HaBacΔegtdsJHAMT ( Figure 3). Similarly, a 288 bp band of dsJHBP-specific product was also detected. No signal was seen in the control (cells infected with HaBacΔegt). These results confirmed again that the recombinants were constructed correctly and dsRNA was able to transcript as expected after infecting.
